transArray.content:
The location of the hotel is good, very close to the Sanyuanqiao subway station, it is convenient to go to the Capital Airport/Daxing Airport, and it is easy to take a taxi.
Facilities are good, the room is clean.
What I want to praise the most is the humanized service: umbrellas can be borrowed on rainy days, breakfast is served until 12:00, and there is a supper with chicken soup and small wontons at 22:00 in the evening. There is also a laundry room/gym, and I canâ€™t operate the iron in the laundry room. , Auntie also helped me iron the skirt together.
Overall, the experience is very good, and the price/performance ratio is very high. I will choose to stay again next time I have a chance
